channel.title: Comments on: I Want My X-CE

item.title: By: Tasku
item.dc:creator: Tasku
item.description:
<blockquote>Consider yourself lucky - the UK amazon has never listed the CE version, and my local store can't pre-order it either (despite me pestering them every week)</blockquote>
um yeah they did, i pre-ordered a copy for myself and my brother from there. link: http://www.amazon.co.uk/gp/product/B000JJZHCS/ref=pd_rhf_p_1/026-1558167-9518017?ie=UTF8
item.content:encoded:
Consider yourself lucky – the UK amazon has never listed the CE version, and my local store can’t pre-order it either (despite me pestering them every week)

um yeah they did, i pre-ordered a copy for myself and my brother from there. link: http://www.amazon.co.uk/gp/product/B000JJZHCS/ref=pd_rhf_p_1/026-1558167-9518017?ie=UTF8

item.title: By: heather
item.dc:creator: heather
item.description: Not getting the CE. The pet looks kind of entertaining, but the rest is kinda meh, from what what I saw. I pre-ordered the regular MONTHS ago from Amazon for both my husband and myself. Now if only it would actually come out... sigh. Someday.
item.content:encoded: Not getting the CE. The pet looks kind of entertaining, but the rest is kinda meh, from what what I saw. I pre-ordered the regular MONTHS ago from Amazon for both my husband and myself. Now if only it would actually come out… sigh. Someday.

item.title: By: Nonentity
item.dc:creator: Nonentity
item.description:
I idly picked one up in the online pre-order right after I heard about them. A few hours later, the item was no longer listed on the site.
I consider myself pretty lucky.
I got overnight shipping. I'm such a shill.
item.content:encoded:
I idly picked one up in the online pre-order right after I heard about them. A few hours later, the item was no longer listed on the site.

I consider myself pretty lucky.

I got overnight shipping. I’m such a shill.
